text: Pecetto Torinese is a comune in the Metropolitan City of Turin in the Piedmont region in Italy. It is about southeast of Turin. Pecetto Torinese is next to these municipalities: Turin, Pino Torinese, Chieri, Moncalieri, Cambiano, and Trofarello. It is known for the production of cherries. == References == Category:Comunes of Turin
title: Pecetto Torinese
